scripts.fetch: read -p 'Days: ' days && eval echo $days | tr ' ' '\n' | xargs -I @ node fetchInput.js @
scripts.delete: read -p 'Days: ' days && read -p 'Are you sure? [y/n]: ' yes && if [ $yes == 'y' ]; then eval echo $days | tr ' ' '\n' | xargs -I @ rm @/input.txt && eval echo Deleted input for $days; fi
